ValidationRule.description: End Date/Time must be at-least 1 day ahead of Start Date/Time
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( ISBLANK( End_Date_Time__c ) ), End_Date_Time__c <= Start_Date_Time__c + (1) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: End Date/Time must be at-least 1 day ahead of Start Date/Time
